Package controller

Class AlbumController

java.lang.Object
controller.AlbumController
public class AlbumController
extends java.lang.Object
Album Controller used to connect the Album.fxml View to Models.
Author:
Naveenan Yogeswaran, Savan Patel

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    (package private) Admin admin
    Reference to Admin who has reference to all Users.
    (package private) javafx.scene.control.ListView<Album> albumListView
    List View that is used to show list of albums belonging to selected user.
    (package private) javafx.collections.ObservableList<Album> albums
    ObservableList used to populate albumListView and to keep track of new changes.
    private static javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage
    Reference to primaryStage used to display all our scenes.
    (package private) User user
    Reference to User who has reference to all of the selected User's Albums.

    • deleteConfirmation

      public boolean deleteConfirmation​(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage, java.lang.String name)
      Asks User to confirm Deletion of Album.
      Parameters:
      primaryStage - Reference to primaryStage used to display all our scenes.
      name - The name of the Album that is to be deleted.
      Returns:
      True if User confirms action; False if User cancels action
